label: clinical_signal_03_dx_pain_management_trial_027
content:
## 2024-09-02 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 110
- Active: 98
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 60
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 12

### Enrollment By Treatment Arm
- Multimodal: 35
- Standard: 37
- Placebo: 38

### Efficacy By Arm
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score Mean: 4.4
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score SD: 1.4
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 24.6
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 9.5
- Multimodal Six MWT (meters) Mean: 379.0
- Multimodal Six MWT (meters) SD: 59.0
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 29.0
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) SD: 5.1
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index Mean: 6.2
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.0
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 2.8
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 1.9

- Standard VAS Pain Score Mean: 5.4
- Standard VAS Pain Score SD: 1.4
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 40.0
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 6.4
- Standard Six MWT (meters) Mean: 324.0
- Standard Six MWT (meters) SD: 51.0
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 22.9
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) SD: 4.0
- Standard Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.9
- Standard Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.4
- Standard Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 4.5
- Standard Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 1.5

- Placebo VAS Pain Score Mean: 6.6
- Placebo VAS Pain Score SD: 1.2
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 49.5
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 11.5
- Placebo Six MWT (meters) Mean: 263.0
- Placebo Six MWT (meters) SD: 57.0
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 20.0
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) SD: 5.8
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.0
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index SD: 0.9
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 6.4
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 1.4

### Physical Therapy
- Sessions Scheduled: 229
- Sessions Attended: 179
- Attendance Rate (%): 90.2

### Safety Labs
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 13.9
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 1.2
- WBC (k) Mean: 5.6
- WBC (k) SD: 1.5
- Platelets (k) Mean: 236
- Platelets (k) SD: 48
- Serum Creatinine (mg/dL) Mean: 0.97
- Serum Creatinine (mg/dL) SD: 0.12
- Blood Glucose (mg/dL) Mean: 87.0
- Blood Glucose (mg/dL) SD: 11.0
- ESR (mm/hr) Mean: 13.0
- ESR (mm/hr) SD: 9.0

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: PM-AE-2708, Description: nausea, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: false, Treatment Arm: standard
- AE ID: PM-AE-2744, Description: dry mouth, Grade: 2, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-2766, Description: pruritus, Grade: 1, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: standard
- AE ID: PM-AE-2731, Description: headache, Grade: 1, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-2723, Description: dizziness, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal

### Protocol Deviations
- PD ID: PM-PD-2736, Description: Grip strength dynamometer calibration overdue by 3 days, Severity: moderate

### Events
- Blinded interim efficacy data compiled for DSMB
- Site 02 monitoring visit completed, 0 findings
- Randomization module updated for new enrollment block

### Notes
- Week 27: Pain management assessments on track. 110 subjects enrolled across treatment arms. Functional outcomes within expected ranges.
